name: Prisoner Army Truck
description:
Prisoner Army Truck is to transport the most wanted army prisoners & criminals to the prison in the maximum lockout facility. These inmates are the insane & most feared in the mafia criminals history so you have to be very careful while transporting them to the jail in the top-security prison so they can’t try to jail break or escape from there because of high security in the penitentiary.
Features:
Challenging missions with extreme off0road environment.
Drive prisoners truck with extreme tuned driving physics.
Pick up the prisoners & drop them to the army base jail.
Real life law enforcer duty with lots of missions.
Smooth controls, steering & brakes.
Exciting gameplay with hd graphics.
Realistic & 3d amazing view & truck driving game.
